Package client.gameWindow

Class GameViewModel

java.lang.Object
client.gameWindow.GameViewModel
public class GameViewModel extends Object
Binds the data coming from the GameModel with its respective GUI-elements and manages the presentation logic for the game window
Author:
Nargess Ahmadi, Felicia Saruba, Li MingHao

    • autoFillRegister

      public void autoFillRegister()
      This method is called when the timer of 30s is up. The registers of the players who have not filled their register with 5 cards in time, will be filled automatically from the remaining hand cards.

    • printMapButtonAction

      public void printMapButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This methos is called by pressing the PRINT MAP button The choosen map is printed and the starting point selection appears.

    • startGameButtonAction

      public void startGameButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method is called when the START GAME button is pressed the GET CARDS button will be displayed for the user.

    • printMapGUI

      public void printMapGUI(String setMapSelection)
      The matching images are added to each board element. Selected map gets printed on the GUI as well as the player characters
